appDesc.message: Liked de YouTube videos van je favoriete content makers automagisch.

reloadNotice.message: Herlaad de pagina om de veranderingen door te bevestigen.

updateNotice.message: Hey! Er is een nieuwe versie beschikbaar.

donateAppeal.message: Hours of development and testing go into maintaining this extension. If you feel it's worth a couple bucks, you can buy my cats a snack.
